com.nuance.android.vocalizer

Class VocalizerSpeechItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nuance.android.vocalizer.VocalizerSpeechItem

  • public class VocalizerSpeechItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an item that has been queued for synthesis. VocalizerEngine.speak(String, boolean, String) returns an instance of this class. The most important use of this class is to synchronously wait for a particular text to be completed, by calling its waitForComplete() method. Note that waitForComplete() must be called from another thread in order to prevent the main application thread from blocking.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nuance Communications

      • waitForComplete

        public void waitForComplete()
        Waits for this item to complete. The calling thread will be blocked until this item completes, or until stop is called.
